overview: Victoria Voxxx and Lilly Bell are hanging out together and Lilly wants Victoria to tell her a story, just like she used to do when they were in college/ Victoria suggests one about robots or maybe rogue alpacas but Lilly insists on a love story and Victoria decides to tell her a story about two women in love. While she tells the story we are transported to a black and white world, complete with laugh track, where we meet baking housewife Maya Wolfe, who appears to be upset by her pie, and her loving wife Alex Coal who has just arrived home.
tagline: Storytime makes for the best time.
title: Storytime
